title: Our Economy This Week | Ep 3
description:
Inflation targets, the middle class, small businesses, new antitrust action and more this week!

Check out the inaugural issue of Social Justice Quarterly, a publication of the Leonine Institute!
https://leoinstitute.org/socialjusticequarterly/
Will the Fed's recasting of its monetary policy strategy help the US economy?
https://thehill.com/opinion/finance/514624-will-the-feds-recasting-of-its-monetary-policy-strategy-help-the-us-economy
Inflation is Higher Than the Numbers Say
https://www.nytimes.com/2020/09/02/business/inflation-worse-pandemic-coronavirus.html
The Decline of American's Upward Mobility in One Chart
https://www.zerohedge.com/markets/decline-upward-mobility-one-chart
The Economy Continues to Unravel Despite All Stimulus Measures
https://www.zerohedge.com/bailout/economy-continues-unravel-despite-all-stimulus-measures
A warning to Democrats: Small business owners are getting angry - very angry
https://thehill.com/opinion/finance/514755-a-warning-to-democrats-small-business-owners-are-getting-angry-very-angry
JPMorgan strategist says investors should get ready for Trump win
https://nypost.com/2020/09/02/jpmorgan-strategist-says-investors-should-get-ready-for-trump-win/
Why Fiverr Stock Jumped 29% Last Month
https://www.fool.com/investing/2020/09/04/why-fiverr-stock-jumped-29-last-month/
Nasdaq posts worst week since March as tech shares slide
https://finance.yahoo.com/news/stock-market-news-live-september-4-2020-221302791.html
How Do FAANG Stocks Look after market Rout?
https://www.morningstar.com/articles/1000671/how-do-faang-stocks-look-after-market-rout
Justice Dept. Plans to File Antitrust Charges Against Google in Coming Weeks
https://www.nytimes.com/2020/09/03/us/politics/google-antitrust-justice-department.html
